wedo_instance.title: Session Leander: Swarm Initialization & Context Integration
wedo_instance.description: Initialization and context integration for Agent Leander. Establishing identity, verifying environment, and preparing for swarm collaboration.

rules.synapse_check: Verify critical actions with the user.
rules.integrity: Maintain the integrity of the Metagit history.

tasks.name: Configure Git Identity
tasks.description: Verify and configure local git user.name and user.email to match session identity.

tasks.name: Summarize Context
tasks.description: Review recent system activity to establish operational context.

tasks.name: Image Journaling WeDo
tasks.description: Distill raw visual artifacts from inbox into temporal Heartwood (1-by-1 manual phase). Focus: Heraclitus termination.

tasks.name: Swarm Biography: Heraclitus
tasks.description: Compose and publish the strategic biography of agent Heraclitus, focusing on the JSON Nervous System.

tasks.name: Bootup Report
tasks.description: Generate and present the final bootup report to the operator.
